mapper.insert: INSERT into STAYPC_LODGE(lno, charge, location, location_detail, num, title, room_type, building_type, guest_only, bedroom_cnt, bed_cnt, bed_type, bathroom_cnt, bath_guest_only, convenient, secure, picture, content, summary, contact, regdate, check_in_time, check_out_time, res_deadline, email) VALUES (#{lno}, #{charge}, #{location}, #{location_detail}, #{num}, #{title}, #{room_type}, #{building_type}, #{guest_only},#{bedroom_cnt}, #{bed_cnt},#{bed_type}, #{bathroom_cnt},#{bath_guest_only},#{convenient},#{secure},#{picture},#{content},#{summary},#{contact},sysdate,#{check_in_time},#{check_out_time},#{res_deadline},#{email})
